materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Hotel des Indes in Batavia (Jakarta) in Indonesia. There is a courtyard in the center of the photograph, with a building complex surrounding it. There are a few tall trees in the center of the photograph, and behind the buildings on the left. All the buildings have shuttered windows. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Hotel des Indes, Batavia, Java
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Jakarta (Indonesia) Colonization Hotels
